title: fancy friends list is vry k00l
body: but why is recently played champions called "recent play style" like out of all the ways you could have worded it you call it recent play style

replies.body: When I saw that I thought it was going to be like support, ad or such. But when I saw champions I was like. OK.
yeah its a bit odd aye. maybe it'll change over time to suit your play style?
